sqlMap.select: SELECT YEAR , MON , DEPT_CD , INNER_DEPT_CD , DEPT_NM , ROLE_TC_NM , INSP_KIND_TC_NM , LAW_TC_NM , STIC_LAG_TC_NM , STIC_MID_TC_NM , STIC_SML_TC_NM , EDU_ST_DATE , EDU_END_DATE , EDU_PLAN_PESN , EDU_TARG_PESN , EDU_RCPT_PESN , EDU_REMN_PESN , EDU_TERM FROM ( SELECT A.EDU_YY AS YEAR , SUBSTR(EDU_END_DATE, 5, 2) AS MON , '5135' AS DEPT_CD , A.DEPT_CD AS INNER_DEPT_CD , B.DEPT_NM , A.ROLE_TC_NM , A.INSP_KIND_TC_NM , A.LAW_TC_NM , A.STIC_LAG_TC_NM , A.STIC_MID_TC_NM , A.STIC_SML_TC_NM , A.EDU_ST_DATE , A.EDU_END_DATE , A.EDU_PLAN_PESN , A.EDU_TARG_PESN , A.EDU_RCPT_PESN , CASE WHEN A.EDU_REMN_PESN >= 0 THEN EDU_REMN_PESN WHEN A.EDU_REMN_PESN < 0 THEN EDU_REMN_PESN END AS EDU_REMN_PESN , EDU_TERM FROM V_GGC0101M_001 A INNER JOIN BSC_DEPTINFO B ON A.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_ID AND EDU_YY = #findYear# AND SUBSTR(EDU_END_DATE, 5, 2) = #findMon# AND ROLE_TC = '31' AND INSP_KIND_TC IN ('03', '07') ) WHERE DEPT_CD = #findDeptId# AND INNER_DEPT_CD = '5100' AND EDU_TERM = '067'

SELECT A.DEPT_ID, B.DEPT_NM FROM BSC_SC_DEPT_MAPPING A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_DEPTINFO B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID WHERE (YEAR, SC_DEPT_ID) IN (SELECT YEAR, SC_DEPT_ID FROM BSC_METRIC WHERE (METRIC_GRP_ID, YEAR) IN (SELECT METRIC_GRP_ID, YEAR FROM BSC_METRIC WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND METRIC_ID = #findMetricId#) AND DELETE_DT IS NULL)

SELECT A.ITEM_CD, B.CAL_TYPE_COL_NM FROM BSC_SYSTEM_ITEM A , BSC_CAL_TYPE_COL B WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND B.METRIC_ID = #findMetricId# AND B.INSERT_GUBUN = '01' ORDER BY B.CAL_TYPE_COL_NM
SELECT DEPT_ID FROM ( SELECT DEPT_ID FROM BSC_SC_DEPT_MAPPING WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND SC_DEPT_ID = #findScDeptCd# ORDER BY DEPT_ID ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
